didImputation 0.0.0.9000

    didImputation

    Estimation of staggered Differences-in-Differences using the imputation approach of Borusyak, Jaravel, and Spiess (2021)

    Installation

    You can install the github version with devtools or renv(recommended, read more about renv)

    devtools::install("CdfInnovLab/didImputation")

    Usage

    The package implements an imputation method to estimate the treatment effect and pre-trend testing in differences-in-differences designs with staggered adoption (i.e where units are treated at different time periods). Recent literature stress out the importance of not using the standard twoway fixed effect regression

    libary(didImputation)
data(did_simulated)

res <- didImputation(y0 = y ~ 0 | i + t,
                    unit = 'i',
                    time = 't',
                    cohort = 'g',
                    data = did_simulated))

summary(res)
